response.explain: The execution error indicates that the fridge is already open. Therefore, the action to open the fridge is unnecessary. We need to revise the subtasks to start with taking the meat out of the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Take the meat out of the fridge
(2) Heat the meat
(3) Put the heated meat on the plate
response.code:
